name: air
description: Literally nothing, the void between blocks.

name: stone
description: Solid rock foundation of Minecraft's underground world.

name: granite
description: Speckled pink-red rock found deep underground.

name: polished_granite
description: Smooth, refined version of rough granite.

name: diorite
description: Light-colored speckled rock from deep caves.

name: polished_diorite
description: Clean, smooth variant of natural diorite.

name: andesite
description: Gray, medium-hardness rock common in mountainous regions.

name: polished_andesite
description: Sleek, uniform surface of refined andesite.

name: deepslate
description: Dark, dense stone found in deep underground layers.

name: cobbled_deepslate
description: Rough, broken pieces of deepslate.

name: polished_deepslate
description: Smooth, sophisticated version of raw deepslate.

name: calcite
description: White, chalky mineral found in caves.

name: tuff
description: Volcanic rock with a distinctive, rough texture.

name: tuff_slab
description: Flat piece of tuff for smooth building.

name: tuff_stairs
description: Volcanic rock stairs for architectural designs.

name: tuff_wall
description: Defensive barrier made from volcanic rock.

name: chiseled_tuff
description: Intricately carved tuff with decorative patterns.

description: Smooth, refined surface of volcanic tuff.

name: polished_tuff_slab
description: Sleek, flat piece of processed tuff.

name: polished_tuff_stairs
description: Elegant stairs crafted from smooth tuff.

name: polished_tuff_wall
description: Sophisticated wall made from refined tuff.

name: tuff_bricks
description: Structured bricks created from volcanic rock.

description: Flat tuff brick for precise construction.

description: Fortified wall constructed from tuff bricks.

name: chiseled_tuff_bricks

name: dripstone_block
description: Pointy stone block found in cave systems.

name: grass_block
description: Iconic green surface representing Minecraft's landscapes.

name: dirt
description: Basic ground material, foundation of many worlds.

description: Rough, less fertile version of standard dirt.

description: Forest floor dirt with organic matter.

name: rooted_dirt
description: Dirt block intertwined with plant roots.

name: mud
description: Wet, squishy ground found in swamps.

description: Vivid red-purple block from the Nether.

name: warped_nylium
description: Striking blue-green block from Nether's warped forests.

description: Rough stone blocks, classic Minecraft building material.
